backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app and includes meta tags and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component coordinating layout, course search, view toggling, settings, and detail navigation using React Query.
frontend/src/components/courses/CourseCa: Displays a course card in grid or list mode with title, description, thumbnail, and a button to open the course URL.
frontend/src/components/courses/CourseDe: Full course detail page with thumbnail, metadata, and multiple actions to open the external course URL.
frontend/src/components/courses/CourseLi: Renders a list or grid of courses with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/courses/CourseSe: Search input with icon and clear button for filtering courses by text.
frontend/src/components/courses/ViewTogg: Toggle control for switching between grid and list course display modes.
Layout component rendering header, hero section, main content, and footer with optional settings and back buttons.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings panel allowing toggling between manual and remote data modes and managing remote feed URL with validation.
frontend/src/features/courses/courseData: Fetches courses from manual list or remote JSON endpoint with validation and fallback on errors.
frontend/src/features/courses/manualCour: Static array of predefined course objects used as the manual course list.
frontend/src/features/courses/types.ts: Type definitions for Course objects and course settings including data source mode.
frontend/src/features/settings/storage.t: Loads and saves course settings to localStorage with sane defaults and error handling.
frontend/src/features/settings/usePersis: React hook managing persisted course settings and syncing them to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and logic including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook fetching courses based on persisted settings using react-query with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the app with providers for react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color system, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, requirements, features, and image needs for a mobile web app showing Tutor LMS course listings without authentication.
